title: Endure the Pain
description: Mobster. Murderer. Monster. Even though I’m all of those awful things, I could still be broken. It’s happened before and I barely survived it.If I were to be broken again, would it kill me? Or can I endure the pain of a shattered soul once more?  Since I’ve returned home, I’ve embraced my inner darkness and have started down a path bathed in blood and smelling of gun metal. War is brewing between my family and another gang. They instigated it but I will end it—them. Even if I have to let my darkness consume me completely. There will be losses on both sides. I just didn’t know ours—mine would be so grave. My name is Maura Quinn. I’m the Banphrionsa—Princess and next in line to take over my father’s dark kingdom of crime. This is my story.***Warning: This is a dark and twisted tale with violence, foul language, and sexual content. Contains triggers. This is also a MFM menage romance.***
author: Ashley N. Rostek
